name: Unseen Possessor
description:
#totem CONTROLS:

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move the player, E to possess objects and F to activate the objects ability ( eliminate the thief ). EXIT THE GAME WITH ALT+F4 !

STORY:

A ghost of a ruler of an ancient culture is awakened by the thieves. He tries to keep them away from the treasure of his tomb by using the power of possession.

CURRENT MECHANICS:

You play as a ghost who has the power of possession. He can  move through walls and possess certain objects to gain an advantage over the enemies and eliminate them. Be careful because if the thief sees you, he will warn the other thieves and they will escape with the treasure they have gathered. There is a lot of new and interesting mechanics that will be added later on!

Have Fun Playing!
